Interface Piece


  • public interface Piece
    Is interface of piece containing many uninitialized methods. Contains methods such as location, gameboard, and player methods. Contains abstract methods such as move, attack, health, and removal methods.
    Version:
    May 28, 2019
    Author:
    Ajeet, Matthew, Period: 4th, Assignment: APCSFinalProject, Sources: None

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAttack()
      Returns the attack damage the piece causes.
      GameBoard getBoard()
      Returns the board piece belongs to.
      int getHealth()
      Returns the current health of the piece.
      Location getLocation()
      Return the location of the piece.
      PieceType getPieceType()
      Return the type of piece the piece is.
      java.lang.String getPlayer()
      Returns the player that owns the piece.
      java.util.ArrayList<Location> possibleAttacks()
      Returns the possible locations the piece can attack.
      java.util.ArrayList<Location> possibleMoves()
      Returns the possible locations the piece can move to.
      void reduceHealth(int h)
      Reduces the health of the piece by h.
      void removePiece()
      Removes the piece from the gameBoard.
      void setAttack(int attack)
      Sets the attack damage the piece causes to attack.
      void setLocation(Location l)
      Sets the location of the piece.
